name: Jerk Chicken
description: Spicy Caribbean grilled chicken with traditional jerk seasoning

instructions.description: Blend peppers, onions, garlic, spices, soy sauce, lime juice
Score chicken pieces and rub with jerk marinade
Marinate in refrigerator for at least 4 hours
Grill chicken, turning occasionally, until cooked through

advance_prep: Marinate chicken for 4-24 hours before grilling
